description:
Kogoro is hired to be the bodyguard of popular idol Risa Purple, and Conan and Ran get to enjoy her concert. Just as the concert is about to begin, two masked men attempt to kidnap Risa. During the confusion, they mistake Ran, who is cosplaying as Risa, for the idol, and mistakenly kidnap her instead. Kogoro and Conan go after the kidnappers, but lose track of them during their pursuit. Kogoro borrows the truck of a recycling shop worker who saw the kindappers and Ran and continues his pursuit. Conan discovers the identities of the kidnappers from an objected dropped near the boat the kidnappers abandoned, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La poursuite enragée de Kogorô (1re partie)
小五郎, 怒りの大追跡 (前編)
